SELECT count(*) FROM TB_STORY s WHERE s.DEL_YN='N'
and s.TITLE LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and s.STORY_NM LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and s.CATEGORY = #{category}

SELECT STORY_SEQ , CATEGORY , STORY_NM , TITLE , IMPORTANT_YN , VIEW_YN , VIEW_UNLIMIT_YN , DATE_FORMAT(VIEW_ST_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') VIEW_ST_DT , DATE_FORMAT(VIEW_END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') VIEW_END_DT , FILE_GRP_SEQ , CONTENTS FROM TB_STORY WHERE STORY_SEQ=#{seq} and DEL_YN='N'
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_STORY SET DEL_YN='Y' WHERE STORY_SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_STORY A WHERE IFNULL(A.DEL_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND A.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND A.IMPORTANT_YN = 'Y'
